mapper.update: update update_request set restaurant_id = #{restaurantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopName = #{shopname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lng_lat = #{lngLat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imgUrl = #{imgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNumber = #{phonenumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_time = #{requestTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where request_id = #{requestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select request_id, restaurant_id, shopName, address, lng_lat, imgUrl, `type`, phoneNumber, `state`, request_time from update_request where request_id = #{requestId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select request_id, restaurant_id, shopName, address, lng_lat, imgUrl, `type`, phoneNumber, `state`, request_time from update_request
